title: Ambassador Nicholas Burns to Rejoin The Cohen Group as a Vice Chair | The Cohen Group
snippet: Ambassador Burns will rejoin the firm as a Vice Chair on February 17, 2025. Prior to his work in China, Ambassador Burns was a Senior Counselor at The Cohen Group for 12 years following an extraordinary career in the US Foreign Service.

title: Nicholas Burns | Harvard Kennedy School
snippet: Professor Burns is Vice Chairman of the Cohen Group and Co-Chair of the Aspen Strategy Group and Aspen Security Forum. He is a member of the American Academy of Arts and Sciences, and the Council on Foreign Relations.

title: Nicholas Burns | The Belfer Center for Science and International Affairs
snippet: Professor Burns is Vice Chairman of the Cohen Group and Co-Chair of the Aspen Strategy Group and Aspen Security Forum. He is a member of the American Academy of Arts and Sciences, and the Council on Foreign Relations.

title: Nicholas Burns | The Cohen Group
snippet: US Ambassador to China (2021–2025) Under Secretary of State for Political Affairs (2005–2008) US Ambassador to NATO (2001–2005) US Ambassador to Greece (1997–2001) Ambassador Nicholas Burns served as US Ambassador to China from 2021 ...

title: R. Nicholas Burns - Wikipedia
snippet: On February 3, 2025, The Cohen Group announced that Burns will rejoin as a vice chair on February 17, 2025.
